title: CRA says it's hiring more call centre staff, using AI to improve services
description: OTTAWA — The Canada Revenue Agency says it's hiring more staff at its call centres and expanding its use of artificial intelligence as part of a 100-day plan to improve its services.
content:

title: I'm not here to replace people': Albania's AI minister speaks to parliament
description: TIRANA — Albania’s new artificial intelligence (AI)-generated minister addressed the country’s parliament for the first time on Thursday, defending its role as “not here to replace people, but to help them.”
content:

title: OpenAI to spend $100 billion over five years on backup servers: Report
description: This expenditure is in addition to the $350 billion the artificial intelligence firm has already projected to spend on server rentals from cloud providers this year through 2030, the report said.

title: Seneca Polytechnic launches its first-ever master’s degree - a program in AI
description: TORONTO, Sept. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Seneca Polytechnic is now offering its first-ever master’s degree with the introduction of the new Master of Artificial Intelligence Design & Development program. Combining an innovative, industry-focused curriculum with hands-on, work-integrated learning, the program will prepare graduates for high-demand careers. The new program was announced on Seneca’s website on September 12, 2025.

title: Pet Smart Collar Provides Real-Time Health Data
description: A new smart collar, called the PetPace V3.0, uses artificial intelligence to track vital signs of dogs and cats and relay them directly to licensed veterinarians.
